resources.string: Welcome to the Smart Secured University Home page, feel free to use following features for the easy of use.
Dont worry about personal security, try using Personal Security Guard .
Finding a missing friend or want to track a friend, try using Missing Person Finder .
Find a missing person or want to track a person, Search using Username, Contact Number or Email Address

string.b: Have you seen this person? Mark the time from drop down
